Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CHAPTER 1028 Rights of Way

1028.01Findings and purpose. 1028.02Scope; administration. 1028.03Definitions. 1028.04Certificate of registration required; exceptions. 1028.05Time limit for compliance; declaration of nuisance; remedies of City. 1028.06Certificate of registration applications. 1028.07Criteria for issuance of certificate of registration. 1028.08Denial of application. 1028.09Expiration of certificate of registration. 1028.10Responsibilities of utility service provider with valid certificate of registration. 1028.11City standards. 1028.12Relocation of equipment. 1028.13Damage to other equipment. 1028.14Right of way vacation. 1028.15Discontinued operations; abandoned equipment; removal. 1028.16-29 Reserved. 1028.30Revocable street privilege permit. 1028.31Applications for revocable street privilege permits. 1028.32Issuance of revocable street privilege permits. 1028.33Work performed under revocable street privilege permits 1028.34Limitations on placement. 1028.35Construction bond requirements. 1028.36Revocable street privilege permit fees. 1028.37-39 Reserved 1028.40Responsibility. 1028.41Insurance 1028.42Written notice of violations. 1028.43Methods of service. 1028.44Failure to cure violations. 1028.45Nonliability of City. 1028.46Rights of appeal. 1028.47Severability. 1028.48Reservation of regulatory and police powers to City. 1028.99Penalty; equitable remedies; liquidated damages.

CROSS REFERENCES

Conditions precedent to improving streets - see S.U. & P.S. 1020.01

Excavations - see S.U. & P.S. Ch. 1022
